code: import React from'react';import{IoIosArrowDropdown}from"react-icons/io";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{API_END_POINT}from'../utils/constant';import axios from'axios';import{setUser}from'../redux/userSlice';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import toast from'react-hot-toast';import{setToggle}from'../redux/movieSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const user=useSelector(store=>store.app.user);const toggle=useSelector(store=>store.movie.toggle);const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const logoutHandler=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API_END_POINT,"/logout"));if(res.data.success){toast.success(res.data.message);}dispatch(setUser(null));navigate('/');}catch(error){console.log(error);}};const toggleHandler=()=>{dispatch(setToggle());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"absolute z-10 flex w-[100vw] items-center justify-between px-6 bg-gradient-to-b from-black ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"w-56",src:"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7a/Logonetflix.png/1200px-Logonetflix.png",alt:"netflix-logo"}),user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IoIosArrowDropdown,{size:"24px",color:"white"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-lg font-medium text-white",children:user.fullName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ml-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logoutHandler,className:"bg-red-800 text-white px-4 py-2",children:"Logout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleHandler,className:"bg-red-800 text-white px-4 py-2 ml-2",children:toggle?"Home":"Search Movie"})]})]})]});};export default Header;
